WebSound - Affordable, Reliable Hosting Solutions
Virtualizor Control Panel | KVM Virtualization | DDoS Protection | US Locations | 1Gbps Uplinks | Weekly Backups | 99.9% Uptime Guaranteed | 14 Day Money Back Guarantee
​


WebSound specializes in providing affordable, reliable web hosting solutions. WebSound cater for all kinds of clientele, offering premium, quality support and services at affordable prices. We meet the needs of all clients, offering a range of services and packages to ensure clients have a choice of packages suitable for their requirements.


All packages include:

  • 14 Day Money Back Guarantee
  • 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
  • DDoS Protection
  • Instant Activation
  • Weekly Backups
  • Virtualizor Control Panel

Available Locations:

  • Las Vegas, United States (KVMH Plans)
  • Los Angeles, United States (KVMSP Plans)
     

DDoS Protection:
We offer free DDoS Protection in both of our locations, their mitigation capacity is as follows:

  • Las Vegas, US: 10Gbps/2Mpps
  • Los Angeles, US: 10Gbps/10Mpps

LookingGlass
We have LookingGlass available in every location for you to run tests, please find the links below:

  • Las Vegas, US: lg.lv.websound.co.uk
  • Los Angeles, US: lg.la.websound.co.uk

FAQ's:
What hardware do you use?
Hardware differs based on the range of VPS that you choose, please refer to this page for specific hardware information.


What is the capacity of your DDoS Protection?
Please refer to this Knowledgebase article for further information.


Can I get a refund?
All of our services come with a 14 day money back guarantee, if you're unhappy with your service you may request a refund within 14 days of ordering.


What Operating Systems are available?
There's too many to list here, so please refer to this knowledgebase article. We also offer support for Custom ISOs which we can upload to your VPS' ISO selection.


Can I purchase additional resources?
If you require additional resources such as RAM, CPU and Disk Space, you're best contacting us for a custom quotation rather than purchasing one of our pre-made packages. Additional Bandwidth is available at £1 per 1TB or £1.50 per 2TB, and Additional IPs are available at £1 each, justification may be required for additional IPs.


Do you offer IPv6?
We can allocate a /80 of IPv6 to VPS upon request in our Los Angeles location (KVMSP range).


*All prices exclude VAT which is charged to EU clients at the rate of your country of residence. UK clients are not charged VAT.


You can take a look at all of our packages over on our website:
www.websound.co.uk
​
